item.description:
It's a brand New Year & we can't wait to see all our Best Friends & hear about their holiday adventures. Our New Year's resolution is to spend More Time Pampering our Pooches! Hooray! We would love to hear what you guys would like to celebrate this year. Make sure to bring your ideas & happy pups for a fun afternoon of socializing & exercising!

Proof of Current vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: I Have a Dream Theme
